 <tr>
  <td width="100" valign="top" align="left">{{{patternPrefix}}}</td>
  <td width="250" valign="top" align="left">The injector replaces all ${BUILD.PROPERTY.NAME} style properties by default. However, you may choose to have different patterns for these property names in your files.
<br/><br/>
For example, if you may choose to keep the tokens in your file like this -
{{{
<bean id="dataSource" class="org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource">
  <property name="url">
    <value>
     jdbc:mysql://@__MYSQL.HOST__@:@__MYSQL.PORT__@/@__MYSQL.SCHEMA__@
    </value>
  </property>
</bean>
}}}
In this case, your {{{patternPrefix}}} is "@__"
</td>
  <td width="250" valign="top" align="left">Default: ${</td>
 </tr>
